name: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm
desc: An algorithm used to set the audio pitch as the rate changes.

items.name: static let spectral: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm
items.desc: A highest-quality time pitch algorithm that’s suitable for music.

items.name: static let timeDomain: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm
items.desc: A modest quality time pitch algorithm that’s suitable for voice.

items.name: static let varispeed: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm
items.desc: A high-quality time pitch algorithm that doesn’t perform pitch correction.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new time pitch algorithm with a string.
